column5: The guy who had the boat for sale has changed his mind, he's not selling it now. oh well it doesn't matter to me. We were talking to Mark's grandpa and he told us not to buy a boat, we get to use his again for the summer! Same as what I was looking at the other day. YES!!!!! Love you grandpa!!!!! He also told us that if he decides to ever sell it then it is ours. "don't worry, we can work something out" how great is that. My truck will be paid for in July so we're going to talk to him then.
Well that certainly sounds like a better deal eh  Good stuff Joyce.  Grandpa's are great!!!  Joey
In the end sure sounds like good news!    Make sure you toss grandpa the occasional fish to keep him happy!
He's their Grandpa, not a seal!   Way to score there. Joyce.
Good things happen to good people!
Don't worry we look after grandpa, he can't hunt anymore either so we give him cute fluffy little 5lbs bunnies to eat.
Sounds like a better deal Jil !!  LOL @ Roy,  sharp as ever!!
